alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:24PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elko County through 300 PM PDT... At 224 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles east of Tuscarora, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
